desc: The Money Spinner Australia is a fundraising machine that helps raise money for those in need. Working alongside high profile charities such as Rotary club, Royal life saving Australia, McDonalds, Woolworth, Salvation Army.

layout.text: "The Money Spinner has raised approximately $12,000 per year on average and provided a wonderful entertainment opportunity to young children and families." - Lisa Vaughan, Stockland Shopping Centre, Balgowlah, NSW
